sentences.en: Another medal was specially struck for him.
sentences.cn: 专门为他铸造了另一枚奖章。

sentences.en: Dryness at the roots can occur very easily specially when plants are grown in containers.
sentences.cn: 根部很容易干枯，特别是当植株被种养在盆中时。

sentences.en: Grass shears are specially made to trim grass growing in awkward places.
sentences.cn: 除草剪刀；专门用于修剪缝隙角落里的青草。

sentences.en: He's bought a specially big TV at vast expense so that everyone can see properly.
sentences.cn: 他花大价钱买了一台特别大的电视机，这样每个人都能看清楚。

sentences.en: I came here specially to see you.
sentences.cn: 我特地到这里来就是为了看你.

sentences.en: Patrick needs to use specially adapted computer equipment.
sentences.cn: 帕特里克需要使用专门改装过的计算机设备。

sentences.en: Rough seas today prevented specially equipped ships from skimming oil off the water'ssurface.
sentences.cn: 今天海面上风浪很大，那些配有专门设备的船只无法展开清除海面浮油的工作。

sentences.en: Stay in bed extra late or get up specially early.
The machine was designed specially for demolishing old buildings.
sentences.cn: 这种机器是专为拆毁旧楼房而设计的.

sentences.en: The ring was specially made for her.
sentences.cn: 这枚戒指是为她订做的。

sentences.en: The school is specially for children whose schooling has been disrupted by illness.
sentences.cn: 这所学校是专门为那些因患病而导致学业中断的孩子们开办的。

sentences.en: They are specially packaged so that they stack easily.
sentences.cn: 它们经过特别包装以便于堆放.

sentences.en: They thought he had escaped through a specially constructed tunnel.
sentences.cn: 他们认为他是通过一条专门修建的地道逃跑的。

sentences.en: What was specially enjoyable about that job?
sentences.cn: 那份工作有什么特别有趣之处？
